t: The lost caves of the Amazon - BBC News
s: Beneath the Amazon rainforest, scientists have recently discovered hundreds of massive caverns in the rich deposits of iron ore.

t: Paleoindian Cave Dwellers in the Amazon: The Peopling of the Americas | Science
s: A Paleoindian campsite has been uncovered in stratified prehistoric deposits in Caverna da Pedra Pintada at Monte Alegre in the Brazilian Amazon. Fifty-six radiocarbon dates on carbonized plant rem...

t: Inside the lost cave world of the Amazon's tepui mountains | New Scientist
s: April 28, 2016 - Caves are like nature’s treasure chests, says de Waele. “They safeguard material from the outside – there’s no wind, no surface erosion,” he says. The tepui caves have been protecting their contents for millions of years.

t: Caves in the Amazon Rainforest | Getaway USA
s: Approximately 180 miles from the ocean city of Fortaleza, the Ubajara National Park has a much-visited cave system. Of the 3,000 square feet of cave at Ubajara, only a third is open to the public. Nine underground chambers flaunt astonishing stalactites and stalagmites.

t: Incredible Cave Paintings 8 Miles-Long Revealed Deep in Amazon Forest: The Sistine Chapel of Ancients
s: November 29, 2021 - An 8-mile long wall of over 10,000 cave paintings was discoverd in Colombia, and is being dubbed the Sistine Chapel of the Ancients.
